Date: Friday, 8/8/1977
Subject: Progress of Dennis Lamp
Dear Sir,
Dennis Lamp is doing pretty good at AA Savannah Braves!
He has an ERA of 3.85, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
